description: The most popular gun to use the 85-12mm cartridge was, of course, the PA md. 71.  Its predecessor, the md. 68, was viewed by many as a sort of failure: although it was reliable and powerful, it was too heavy to be used as a good infantry weapon, and not really heavy enough to be a good support gun.  Enough were made, though, that during the zombie apocalypse, it gained a great deal of resurgent popularity as a light emplacement gun that used readily available ammunition.  It perfectly served the purposes of the Exodii, who had far less concern about its unwieldiness.

This extremely popular Romanian assault rifle, made famous in the third Carpachian War, has been redesigned slightly by the Exodii to serve as a sniper weapon.  It is well suited to rapid precision shots against high-priority targets; it is less suited to taking on a horde, as the clip size and firing rate has been reduced.
